data.title: Wes Nelson: His rise from reality TV to the music charts
data.meta_description: Who is Wes Nelson? Is Wes Nelson a singer? How old is Wes Nelson? Can Wes Nelson sing? Who is Wes Nelson dating? What series of Love Island was Wes Nelson on?
data.text:
His new single with Craig David is out now!

When you think of the name Wes Nelson you'll probably think of reality TV shows like Love Island and Dancing On Ice, but that's all changing as the former Islander is making SERIOUS waves in the world of music!

Following his appearance on The Games in 2022, Wes dropped two songs called ‚ÄòThree Words‚Äô and ‚ÄòMessage From My Ex', following his collab with French Montana, and a tour with newly-reunited N-Dubz. Wes delighted his fans again in 2024, releasing the track 'ABRACADABRA' in February, before his European tour later in the year!

Who is Wes Nelson?

Wes Nelson, or Wesley Nelson as he is also known, is a reality TV star and singer who shot to fame when he appeared on the fourth series of ITV2 dating show Love Island in 2018.

After finishing in fourth place on Love Island, Wes got the appetite for reality TV, going on to be a contestant on Dancing On Ice, before appearing on The X Factor: Celebrity, as he attempted to break into the world of music.

In recent years, Wes has established himself as a recording artist, releasing his debut single 'See Nobody' in 2020.

In May 2022, Wes Nelson appeared on ITV's revival of hit show The Games and was even crowned the winner, going on to be the support act for N-Dubz on their UK tour.

He since released a number of hit songs.

Check out all of the places you've seen Wes Nelson:

How old is Wes Nelson?

Wes was born on 18th March 1998, currently making him 26-years-old.

How tall is Wes Nelson?

Wes is 6 feet 2 inches.

Where is Wes Nelson from?

Wes is from Newcastle-under-Lyme in Staffordshire, England.

Is Wes Nelson a singer?

He is! Not only did Wes keep the Love Island villa entertained by dropping some beats during his time on the show, the singer broke into the world of music in 2020, dropping his debut single and going on to release a number of hits.

After turning down record deals and the chance to work with the likes of Simon Cowell, Wes signed his first record deal in August 2020 with EMI Records. Following the success of his debut single, Wes then signed a new deal with Universal Music Group and EMI Records.

In January 2024, Wes confirmed he is now a fully independent artist, and in April 2024, he announced the exciting that his own record label had signed with Sony Music UK.

Sharing the news on Instagram, he wrote:' Today I signed MY OWN Record Label to @sonymusicuk ü§ØüòÖ My team and I have been working really hard to build something special on our own and @rcalabelgroupuk are the perfect partners to take it to the next level! Here‚Äôs to new beginnings and ‚ÄòFoot Down Records‚Äô! üòÅ‚ù§Ô∏è'. (sic)

Is Wes Nelson releasing new music?

Wes excited fans in January 2024 by teasing the release of a new collaboration, which later arrived on 2nd February with Craig David!

Taking to his Instagram Story, Wes opened up about the promo for the single and said: 'I usually HATE doing promo but something about this song and the reactions is so special! I'm also fully independent now so all the likes comments and shares really are what makes the song successful!

'I see all of your support and it genuinely means more than you could imagine. So thank you!'

Did Wes Nelson go on tour with N-Dubz?

He sure did! In May 2022, after 12 years apart, hip-hop group N-Dubz announced they were reuniting, with Tulisa, Dappy and Fazer announcing a UK tour in November.

It was later confirmed that Wes Nelson would be a very special guest on the tour, playing dates in Newcastle, Glasgow, Nottingham, Leeds, Birmingham, Bournemouth, Cardiff, London, Sheffield and Manchester.

Ahead of the show at London's 02, Wes told fans on Instagram: 'My parents are coming to watch me perform at the O2 Arena tonight..this is a dream come true! ‚ù§Ô∏è Everything @n_dubz is back to normal üôèüèæ This is gonna be a special show üòå'. (sic)

When is Wes on tour?

In November 2023, Wes announced tickets were on sale for his first ever European tour, which is taking place in May 2024.

He wrote on social media: 'Tickets are on sale now for my first headline European tour üòÆ‚Äçüí®Got a whole bunch of new music on the way, we‚Äôre hitting a load of new places and returning to some cities. Hit the link in my bio to get your tickets.' (sic)

Check out the dates below:

May 2024

Zurich, Exil - Thur 2nd

Cologne, Luxor - Fri 3rd

Berlin, Hole 44 - Sun 5th

Dublin, The Academy - Mon 6th

Nottingham, The Rescue Rooms - Wed 8th

Glasgow, SWG3 Galvanizers - Thur 9th

Birmingham, O2 Academy2 - Sun 12th

Cardiff, The Globe - Mon 13th

Manchester, New Century Hall - Thur 16th

London, 02 Academy Islington - Fri 17th

In May 2023, Wes embarked on his first ever headline tour, playing at six locations across the UK and Ireland, including Glasgow, Newcastle, Manchester, Birmingham, Dublin, and London.

Wes also joined N-Dubz on their Summer 2023 tour, alongside Nathan Dawe, Tion Wayne and Venbee.

The tour kicked off on 17th June at the Isle of Wight Festival, and ended on 8th September in Cardiff.

Wes Nelson songs:

'Tell Me'

Wes dropped his track 'Tell Me' on 25th November 2021, teaming up with Steel Banglez, Clean Bandit, Stefflon Don and Unknown T.

Amping up the excitement prior to the song's release, Wes shared clips of the music video, which saw him living it up with his pals at a bowling alley.

'See Nobody'

Wes dropped his debut single 'See Nobody' featuring Hardy Caprio in September 2020, with the track reaching Number 3 on the Official UK Charts.

Wes actually wrote and produced the track during lockdown from his makeshift studio in his bedroom!

In February 2021, 'See Nobody' was certified BPI Gold.

'Nice To Meet Ya'

The singer then followed up with a collaboration alongside British rapper Yxng Bane, on the single 'Nice To Meet Ya'. Although the track only reached number 33 in the Official UK Charts, it was loved by fans.

Wes said of the single: ‚ÄúI wanted people to sing Nice To Meet Ya and just feel good about themselves, like 3 minutes of escapism! Especially with lockdowns we‚Äôre all feeling a bit trapped and people are down, I just want people to get up and feel good.‚Äù

In July 2022, Wes took to social media to reveal the news that 'Nice To Meet Ya' hit 100 Million streams on Spotify.

He wrote: 'Can‚Äôt believe I‚Äôm even typing this but, ‚ÄòNice To Meet Ya‚Äô has just hit 100 MILLION streams on Spotify! One of my proudest moments to date! All I can say is, thank you from the bottom of my f----ing heart ‚ù§Ô∏è New music is weeks away üôèüèæ'. (sic)

'Habits'

Wes went on to drop a track called 'Habits' with Ayo Beatz in June 2021.

'Drive'

Wes confirmed in July 2021 that he would be featuring on Clean Bandit's single 'Drive', alongside German DJ, producer and musician Topic.

Wes wrote on Instagram: 'The news is out, ‚ÄòDrive‚Äô @cleanbandit , @topic & yours truly! üòÖü§Ø I‚Äôve wanted to announce this for so long and it‚Äôs finally here! ü§© Pre-save link In my bio this ones Special! üëÄ'. (sic)

The upbeat track landed on Friday 30th July, showcasing Wes' amazing vocals.

'Say Nothing'

Wes dropped 'Say Nothing' on Friday 22nd October, his first feature-free single!

Speaking to Official Charts about the release of what he is dubbing his debut solo single, Wes said: ‚ÄúI am confident about it. I guess you have to be confident with every track you release, but this is one of my favourites. It‚Äôs the second song I ever wrote after See Nobody. Most people thought I was going to release this first.‚Äù

'Fly Away'

In July 2022, Wes teased his brand new single 'Fly Away', asking fans to guess who he's collaborated with.

Sharing a snippet from his upcoming single, Wes wrote: '¬£250 for the FIRST person to guess the feature on my new single ‚ÄòFly Away‚Äô üëÄ 1 name per comment, guess as many as you want and make sure you drop a like, GO! ü§£ '. (sic)

Just weeks later, Wes confirmed he'd teamed up with American star French Montana for the single, which lands on Friday 15th July.

Announcing the release of two singles on Thursday 17th November, Wes told fans: 'MY NEW SINGLES ARE OUT!!! ü§Ø I‚Äôve put everything into these tracks and spilled a lot of emotions I‚Äôd generally keep private! If you fvck with me PLEASE share this to your story! LOVE ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüèæ'. (sic)

'3 Words (Message To My Ex)

'Message From My Ex'

'Forever'

At the end of April, Wes announced he'd be releasing his first track of 2023 on 5th May, a single called 'Forever'.

He wrote on Instagram ahead of the release: 'My first release of the year üòÖ Forever - May 4th. Can‚Äôt believe it‚Äôs taken so long but it‚Äôs finally ready! Hope you love it as much as i do! üôèüèæ Pre-save link in my bio, I‚Äôll be sending out previews tonight ‚ù§Ô∏è'. (sic)

In June, Wes then dropped an acoustic version of the track, much to the delight of fans.

'Good Part'

In November 2023, Wes teamed up with Deeps to release a track called 'Good Part'.

'ABRACADABRA'

After weeks of teasing a special collab, on Friday 2nd February 2024, Wes dropped his amazing new single 'ABRACADABRA‚Äô with the one and only Craig David!

Sharing a snippet of the song after it was released, Wes wrote on Instagram: 'I think a couple of you guessed it‚Ä¶ ü§£ Such a special song for us! ‚ù§Ô∏è We had way too much fun going back to back on this track and we‚Äôre can‚Äôt wait for you guys to hear the full record. Wes Nelson Ft. Craig David - ‚ÄòABRACADABRA‚Äô - 2nd February üôèüèæ'. (sic)

Who has Wes Nelson collaborated with?

Wes is wasting no time in collaborating with artists on his records. For his debut single 'See Nobody', Wes drafted in help of British-Sierra Leonean rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer Hardy Caprio.

Wes then went on to work with Ayo Beatz and Yxng Bane, and Clean Bandit, and now he's worked with French Montana on 2022 hit 'Fly Away'.

In 2024, Wes teamed up with Craig David!

Is Wes Nelson working with Liam Payne?

Wes sent his fans into overdrive in April 2022, sharing a video in the music studio with the one and only Liam Payne!

Whilst a track played in the background, Wes wrote: 'We got another one @LiamPayne'.

Wes then shared a snippet of an unknown track whilst he bopped away, telling fans: 'I've been busy busy. Almost time now...'.

The pair are yet to officially reveal any details, but keep your eyes pealed!

Was Wes Nelson on Love Island?

Wes Nelson appeared on series four of Love Island, entering the popular villa on Day One in 2018. Despite initially coupling up with Laura Anderson, Wes ended up with bombshell Megan Barton-Hanson, with the pair making it all the way to the final.

Despite not taking part in the All Stars series as a Islander, Wes did appear on the All Stars series alongside Craig David! The pair entered the villa to perform their single 'Abracadabra', whilst the Islanders enjoyed a pool party.

Awkwardly for Wes, his ex-girlfriend Arabella Chi was in the villa at the time!

Who is Wes Nelson dating?

Following a string of high-profile relationships in the past, Wes kept more quiet about his most recent relationship with model Lucciana Beatriz Beynon, going public on New Year's Eve to ring in 2022. Unfortunately, the relationship was reported to have ended in July 2022 after nearly two years together.

Who has Wes Nelson dated in the past?

Megan Barton-Hanson

After getting into a relationship with Megan Barton-Hanson during his time in the Love Island villa, the pair made it all the way to the final and ended up finishing in fourth place behind Kaz Crossley and Josh Denzel, Laura Anderson and Paul Knops and 2018 winners Dani Dyer and Jack Fincham.

Things seemed to be going very well for Wes and Megan when they left the villa, with the couple quickly moving in together and even getting a pet hamster!

However, just days after a public spat with Wes's Dancing On Ice partner Vanessa Bauer, Megan released one of the best split statements of all time.

She wrote a somewhat joking message on Instagram that read: 'It is with hearts full of sadness that we have decided to separate, We have been working hard for well under a year, some of it together, some of it separated, to see what might been possible between us, and we have come to the conclusion that while we love each other very much we will remain separate.

'We are however, and always will be a family, and in many ways we are closer than we have ever been. We are parents first and foremost, to one incredibly wonderful hamster and we ask for his and out space and privacy to be respected at this difficult time. We haven't really conducted our relationship that privately , and we hope that as we consciously uncouple and co-parent, we will be able to continue in the same manner. Love, Megan & Wes'

She later added: 'In all seriousness, I am so grateful and so blessed to have found Wes, I will always love and adore him and I am so lucky to call him my best friend, it has been an incredibly hard decision to make for both of us but we are both looking forward to moving on together as friends and supporting each other in everything we do. I will be down at Dancing On Ice tomorrow to watch him smash I again. Only one thing left to say come on Wes and Vanessa'.

Arabella Chi

Months later, rumours were rife that Wes was dating Love Island 2019 star Arabella Chi. After being spotted together on a number of occasions just weeks after Arabella left the villa, the pair went Instagram official with their romance in August 2019.

Just a month later in September 2019, Wes revealed to Heatworld he'd practically already moved in with his girl, saying: "I've practically moved in. Arabella lives in Battersea, so I've been living there for the past two months. We've been looking at some potential places we could move into.

"We're not in any rush to move in because we feel pressured to, but we know that it's definitely on the horizon."

However, after nine months together, Wes and Arabella split during lockdown in 2020, with the pair admitting they'd 'grown apart'.

Lucciana Beatriz Beynon

Wes went public with his relationship with Lucciana Beatriz Beynon on New Year's Eve 2021, ringing in the new year of 2022 alongside his then-girlfriend and announcing their relationship on Instagram.

Sharing a blurred snap alongside his girl on Instagram, Wes tagged her in the snap as he wrote: 'Here‚Äôs to 2022 and beyond üñ§üëÄ Happy new Year my people üôèüèæüéâ'.

Lucciana is the daughter of millionaire tobacco tycoon 'Candyman' Travers Beynon and apparently, Wes' single 'Say Nothing' is actually about her.

Wes opened up about their relationship on Will Njobvu & Yewande Biala's Tea Time Podcast, saying: "She keeps me grounded. I get home, I‚Äôve still got the dishes to do. Literally this happened, I performed with Clean Bandit at Wembley - one of the maddest things I‚Äôve ever done in my life - then came home to clean the dishes. That‚Äôs what you need."

However, it was reported in July 2022 that the pair had split, with many publications alleging that it was due to conflicting schedules.

Check out which Love Island couples are still together, and which aren't:

Was Wes Nelson on Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins?

He was! Wes took part in 2021 series of Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins, alongside the likes of Alexandra Burke, Vicky Pattison, Kerry Katona and Jake Quickenden.

Wes confirmed the news on his Instagram page, writing: 'BIG NEWS! I‚Äôm excited to announce I‚Äôm gonna be a part of this years Celebrity SAS Who Dares Wins! üëÄü§ï I was gonna say how difficult the course is but tbh it‚Äôs just plain f----- up!! ü§£ I‚Äôve never been so humbled In my life! ü•¥ It broke me down, built me up and completely changed me as a person, I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful! üôèüèæ I‚Äôm not a guy who tends to show my weaknesses mentally or physically but thanks to @antmiddleton and the DS you get to see them all for your entertainment next Sunday @channel4 the 29th ü§£ Enjoy!! üòÖ @sas_whodareswins' (sic)

Wes made it all the way to end of the process, overcoming a series of gruelling challenges to pass selection alongside Alexandra Burke and Aled Davies.

Was Wes Nelson on The X Factor?

Although Wes didn't appear on the original series of The X Factor, he did take part in Simon Cowell's spin-off show The X Factor: Celebrity at the end of 2019.

Wes joined his Love Island co-stars Eyal Booker, Zara McDermott and Samira Mighty to form a Love Island supergroup, with the quartet competing against other celebrities such as The Chase's Jenny Ryan, TOWIE's Megan McKenna and Glee star Kevin McHale.

No Love Lost finished the show in 8th place with Simon Cowell as their mentor, but the group disbanded after the series.

Was Wes Nelson on Dancing On Ice?

Following his stint on Love Island, Wes appeared on another ITV show at the beginning of 2019, signing up for Dancing On Ice.

Wes was partnered with professional skater Vanessa Bauer, with the pair making it all the way to the final alongside former Strictly Come Dancing star James Jordan. Unfortunately Wes wasn't able to win the show, settling for runner-up instead!

Was Wes Nelson on The Games?

Wes took part in ITV's revival of The Games in May 2022. The show, which was hosted by Holly Willoughby and Freddie Flintoff, aired live for five consecutive nights between 9th-13th May.

Wes completed in Olympic Games style events such as Diving, Swimming, Cycling, Hurdles, Weightlifting and Javelin against 11 other celebrities, including Max George, Ryan Thomas, Josh Herdman and Kevin Clifton.

Wes finished top of the male leaderboard at the end of the week, and he was also crowned the overall winner of the competition.

Does Wes Nelson have a brother?

He does! Wes' older brother Curtis Nelson is a professional footballer who currently plays for Derby County.

During the 23/24 season, Curtis was part of Derby's promotion-winning campaign, playing 4,140 minutes in Sky Bet League One.

Wes expressed his pride on social media, writing: 'This is mental!!! The only outfield player in the league to play every second of every game! From the start all the way to promotion!! My big brother!' (sic)

Does Wes Nelson have a degree?

Before appearing on Love Island, Wes' day job was an electric and nuclear systems design engineer, a career he got into after landing himself a degree in engineering from Newcastle College.

Is Wes Nelson on social media?

He is, and he's very active on it!

You can follow Wes Nelson on Instagram at: wes.nelson

You can follow Wes Nelson on Twitter at: @WesNelsonMusic

You can follow Wes Nelson on Facebook at: Wes Nelson

You can follow Wes Nelson on TikTok at: wes.nelson

How to listen to KISS:

Listen to KISS, KISSTORY and KISS Fresh on our free Rayo app, by hitting the play button on the bottom of your screen and on your smart speaker (‚ÄòPlay KISS FM‚Äô, ‚ÄòPlay KISSTORY‚Äô, ‚ÄòPlay KISS Fresh‚Äô). KISS and KISSTORY are also available on DAB.
